actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Labor Standards.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1983 to revise the exemption from the minimum wage and overtime compensation requirements of that Act for managers of hotels, motels, restaurants, and apartments.

summary.text: Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to exempt from the minimum wage and overtime requirements managers employed by enterprises offering lodging, apartments or food services.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1983 to revise the exemption from the minimum wage and overtime compensation requirements of that Act for managers of hotels, motels, restaurants, and apartments.
